modName: Khaliza of Gilane -Redguard Housecarl of Markarth- -Adult-
summary: Khaliza from the Hammerfell city of Gilane is the daughter of a once infamous Barazan the Beheader of the Dire Wolves Gladiatorial team. He trained his daughter well in the gladiatorial arts and she became a favored albeit rare gladiatrix (female gladiator). She is a replacer for Argis of Bulwark, Housecarl of Markarth.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-1-1343424604.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-1-1343421216.jpg[/img][/center]

[b]I infused a bit of Roman Gladiatorial history within her Redguard lore. Most Roman Gladiatrix appeared to have been topless during combat and Khaliza is no different, I designed her with that in mind. Her skin tone is a medium brown but will look lighter or darker depending on your lighting settings, mods and ENB settings . You will note I use no face presets or facegen helpers with my characters like some other modders do. I feel that is the easy way out. I take my time and play with the cards Vanilla has dealt me when it comes to character creation. I hope you enjoy her companionship as much as I have during her creation phase.[/b]

[b][size= 4][color= red][font= timesnewroman]
Required Files: Latest version of ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_0 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/76734
Race: Redguard
Voice: Female Even Toned
Hair: Brown with Reddish Highlights
Eyes: Amber
Weight: 100% at the scale. If you use ADEC, UNPB or CBBE bodies with BBP she should be perfect.
Height: 5\'10\" to 5\'11\"  (remember to Setnpcweight 100 and Setscale 0.99 in console if you get the black face bug. Then just walk outside of a building or reload from a save and all should be well)
Location: Markarth after completing requirements to be the Thane of Markarth... 
Perks and Spells: Her perks are geared for one or two handed weapons and either light or heavy armor use. She will use healing if her health gets below 80% on non-essential versions. 
Inventory: She is equipped with two Redguard scimitars. She is nude without armor so you can outfit her with whatever you wish 
Properties: She is available non-essential or essential and is marriageable.[/b][/size][/font][/color]

[b]Optional Files: To make her look like she does in my images 
I used Bella\'s Better Females, Makeup variant 1 and her No Shine on her.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812

Darker Neater Brows by Caliente
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

Her body in my images is CBBEv3 main body with Navetseas CBBE 1.8 body \"Muscle Map Vers. 2\"; and Glossy Skin for all female bodymod - v05 - No Gloss textures. (She can be used with whatever body you prefer) 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5437
High Resolution Scars by Xenius 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4784 

She is wearing a mashup I created of Mak\'s Remodeled CBBE Armor and Vanilla kit. This was done by using the console to add the various armor pieces to her inventory. Type in console: help arms, pauldron, belt, bikini etc... (She will appear nude in your game!)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004
17 Craftable Pantys for CBBEv3M by goTha
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16837
 Expanded Jewelry Crafting by lautasantenni
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8361[/b]

[b]Note: Since she is created using the NPC Editor I painstakingly removed each and every extra Apachii hair file from her. There should be no extra hairs in the \"showracemenu\" with this mod in use.[/b]

[B][COLOR=crimson][font= timesnewroman][size= 4]***Remember to use the latest version of ApachiiSkyHairFemale!!!***[/size][/B][/COLOR][/font] 

[b][size= 3]Thanks for checking out my mod and please endorse her if you like her! :) 

Regards,

FB[/b][/size]
author: FalmerBane
